snippet.title: Panic Delivery – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Deliver or Die Trying! 🚚📦💀

The apocalypse has come, but deliveries must go on! In Panic Delivery, you and your co-op crew are the last couriers in a world where monstrous clients demand their packages—no matter the cost.
Face procedurally generated dungeons, avoid deadly traps, and survive horrific creatures as you rush to complete deliveries in this horror comedy roguelite multiplayer!

🔥 DEMO LIVE at Steam Next Fest (Feb 24 – Mar 3)! 🔥

👾 Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/m7cVvP8JBy

⚡ Wishlist on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/PanicSteam

🔗Website: www.panicdelivery.com 

📢 FEATURES:

🚚 Co-op multiplayer chaos – Work together (or fail miserably) in a world where couriers are disposable.

📦 Procedural dungeons – Every delivery is different. Survive shifting environments, traps, and terrifying creatures.

💀 Horror comedy twist – The world has ended, but that doesn’t mean we can’t have fun!

🎮 Customization & upgrades – Unlock gear, personalize your courier, and optimize your strategy.

🕹️ Demo available during Steam Next Fest!

💬 Follow us on social media for updates:

Twitter/X: @panicdelivery
Instagram: @panicdelivery
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@panicdelivery
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PanicDelivery/ 

#PanicDelivery #IndieGame #HorrorComedy #DeliverOrDie #SteamNextFest #Roguelite #Multiplayer
